# ResultsCollection

**Protocol**

A protocol representing a collection of returned items with support for sectioning.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol ResultsCollection<Result>
```

## Associated Types

- **Result**

## Instance Properties

- **items**: All result items.
- **promptLabel**: A text prompt shown at the top of the view that presents the options.
- **usesIndexedCollation**: If set to true, presents the list of options with an alphabetical index on the right side of the screen (table view section index titles).

## Type Properties

- **empty**: An empty result.

## Results

- **IntentResult**: A type that contains the result of performing an action, and includes optional information to deliver back to the initiator.
- **IntentResultContainer**: An object that represents the output of a completed intent.
- **OpensIntent**: The result of performing an action that delivers an app intent back to the initiator of the action.
- **ProvidesDialog**: The result of performing an action that delivers a dialog back to the initiator of the action.
- **ReturnsValue**: The result of performing an action that delivers a value back to the initiator.
- **ShowsSnippetView**: The result of performing an action that delivers a view back to the initiator of the action.

## Conforming Types

- IntentItemCollection
